posts.post_title: FS: T206 Uzit Heinie Wagner SGC Authentic
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone,
I have the below Heinie Wagner Uzit available for $600 delivered.  Check or money order only, please, thanks...Mark

[IMG]http://i42.photobucket.com/albums/e327/lvpoker05/IMG-WagnerUzitFront-1.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i42.photobucket.com/albums/e327/lvpoker05/IMG-WagnerUzitBack-1.jpg[/IMG]

Mark
